sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Japanese boxwood (Buxus microphylla var. japonica 'Green Beauty') is an amazing plant species, highly admired for its evergreen quality and small, bright green leaves. It's low-maintenance with an impressive tolerance for many temperature and environmental variations. Its dense, green foliage provides attractive texture throughout the year, and it's been known to grow fairly quickly and effectively create barriers. It can even be sheared into intricate shapes and is easily manipulated into hedges and edging designs. In short, Japanese boxwood is an ideal choice for an easy, adaptable evergreen that is sure to bring beauty and life to any landscape.
